Bloglines vs Google Reader:Two Horse Race?

2:29 PM: Google Reader: “We found it!” - Search, Minimize Bar, and new Forums.

9:00 PM: Bloglines Beta 1.0.1 - Pin, E-Mail, New Help, and Hotkeys.

Lets see what next week brings :-)

PS: Bloglines has had Blog Search within our feeds for over 15 months, and a minimize bar for 17 months. Har har har har……
